text: Rohit Suchanti is an Indian television actor known for portraying Ratan Singh in Rishta Likhenge Hum Naya and participating in Bigg Boss 12. ==Early life== Rohit Suchanti did his schooling in Jaipur, Rajasthan. ==Career== Rohit Suchanti made his debut as a child actor in Saas Bina Sasural. Later, he entered MTV India's Warrior High as Rohit Aggarwal. In early 2017, he played Ricky Modi in Saath Nibhaana Saathiya on Star Plus. Then he played Jai in ALTBalaji's Class of 2017. In September 2017, he joined Rishta Likhenge Hum Naya playing Ratan Maan Singh. In October 2018, he joined Bigg Boss 12 as the second wildcard entry. He got evicted on December 14, 2018. In 2019 he played Anshuman Sharma in Zee TV's Dil Yeh Ziddi Hai. ==Television== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
